snippet.title: Woman charged with murdering partner in NT
snippet.content:
GREG BROWN, PAUL MALEY
Two western Sydney men have been charged for their alleged role in a plan to bring down a commercial jet.
Peter Lalor
Cricket Australia chief says the bitter dispute with players, which has today been resolved, has damaged the game.
Rosie Lewis, Stephen Brook
Veteran Nine political editor Laurie Oakes, who is set to retire, says there's a reason his decision has been made easier.
BRAD NORINGTON
Former NSW Labor leader John Robertson, who once signed a letter for the Lindt Cafe siege gunman, is to retire.
RACHEL BAXENDALE
Liberal MPs will return to Canberra a day early next week for a special partyroom meeting to discuss same sex marriage.
Remy Varga
A Sky News presenter shut down Coalition MP Tim Wilson, who refused to answer a question on same-sex marriage | WATCH
TESSA AKERMAN
Sophie Mirabella appears in court over newspaper article claiming she pushed another MP out of a photo.
Nick Kyrgios was heckled after being caught on camera saying 'I don't wanna play' before retiring hurt in the US | WATCH
